snippet: SHEPPARD--Annamay, passed away in her sleep at her home in West Orange, New Jersey on December 30, 2015. She was 88.5 years old. For anyone who knew her or her work as a civil rights attorney, activist, and Rutgers Law School professor, it is clear that it's difficult to summarize who she was or the effect she had on others. She was magnetic, funny, serious, smart, and strongly believed in the work she did. People loved her deeply. Her community stretched wider than even we, her family, knew. Thank you for being a part of Annamay's life. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SHEPPARD--Annamay, passed away in her sleep at her home in West Orange, New Jersey on December 30, 2015. She was 88.5 years old. For anyone who knew her or her work as a civil rights attorney, activist, and Rutgers Law School professor, it is clear that it's difficult to summarize who she was or the effect she had on others. She was magnetic, funny, serious, smart, and strongly believed in the work she did. People loved her deeply. Her community stretched wider than even we, her family, knew. Thank you for being a part of Annamay's life. 1/3
